query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'chat_messages' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3aUD1tK7DVesR3q.9cd46f6255b0 --database m9uKAAPN5b6jXSh8RAgBzz --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'chat_messages' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE	COLUMN_DEFAULT
id	int	NO	NULL
prospectId	int	NO	NULL
userId	int	NO	NULL
direction	enum	NO	NULL
content	text	NO	NULL
screenshotUrl	text	YES	NULL
analysisContext	enum	YES	NULL
detectedTone	varchar	YES	NULL
reasoning	text	YES	NULL
isAiSuggestion	tinyint	YES	0
suggestionType	enum	YES	NULL
wasSent	tinyint	YES	0
createdAt	timestamp	NO	CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
